diagnostic.message: Don't use the Count() extension method on a source of type 'string', use the 'Length' property instead.
Don't use the Count() extension method on a source of type 'int[]', use the 'Length' property instead.
Don't use the Count() extension method on a source of type 'System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyList<int>', use the 'Count' property instead.
Don't use the Count() extension method on a source of type 'System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection<int>', use the 'Count' property instead.
Don't use the Count() extension method on a source of type 'System.Collections.Generic.IList<int>', use the 'Count' property instead.
Don't use the Count() extension method on a source of type 'System.Collections.Generic.ICollection<int>', use the 'Count' property instead.
Don't use the Count() extension method on a source of type 'int[]', use the 'Length' property instead.
Don't use the Count() extension method on a source of type 'int[]', use the 'Length' property instead.
